name: Snooker.io
description:
What are you waiting for? Let the fun begin.

Shoot & play it where ever you want. Drag your ball and attack other pool enemies to throw them in pockets or out of the table.

Main Features:

* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Throw your opponents into pockets.
* Suitable for all ages
* Choose your table skin
* Highly optimized graphics and sounds
* Real-time multiplayer gameplay with simple & easy controls
